channel.title: benchmarks on Hack MySQL
channel.description: Recent content in benchmarks on Hack MySQL

item.title: Are Aurora Performance Claims True?
item.description: Amazon claims that Aurora has “Up to 5X the throughput of MySQL”. Is it true? It wasn’t easy to find the truth, but I kept digging until I found it. This is a long read; let’s chase the rabbit all the way down the hole.

item.title: COMMIT Latency: Aurora vs. RDS MySQL 8.0
item.description: Let’s examine COMMIT latency on Aurora v2 (MySQL 5.7) vs. Aurora v3 (MySQL 8.0) vs. RDS MySQL 8.0 2-AZ vs. RDS MySQL 8.0 3-AZ “cluster”.
